meanings.definition: A narrative of real or imaginary events; a story.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading a thrilling tale before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: The old man told a tale of his adventures at sea.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the silly tale of the talking animals.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a tale of two cities, full of contrasts and surprises.
meanings.sent5: The tale of the brave knight defeating the dragon was etched in their memories.

meanings.sent1: He knew it was just a tale meant to deceive others.
meanings.sent2: Spreading tales about others can harm relationships.
meanings.sent3: She rolled her eyes at his exaggerated tale of catching a giant fish.
meanings.sent4: His excuse was a tale as tall as a skyscraper, unbelievable and unrealistic.
meanings.sent5: The tale he spun to avoid trouble only made things worse in the end.
